name: Torrent
summary: Powers up Water-type moves by 1.5x if the user is at 1/3 of their maximum HP.
viability: Similar to Swarm, Blaze, and Overgrow, Torrent works the best on bulkier water types like Empoleon, Blastoise, or Swampert. They can tank hits, and when they are at a low enough HP, can fire back with a powerful Hydro Pump or Waterfall.
